remarks: Lemma for isomorphism H of a lattice meet.  (Contributed by NM, 7-Apr-2014.)  (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
dihmeetlem14.b $e |- B = ( Base ` K ) $.
dihmeetlem14.l $e |- .<_ = ( le ` K ) $.
dihmeetlem14.h $e |- H = ( LHyp ` K ) $.
dihmeetlem14.j $e |- .\/ = ( join ` K ) $.
dihmeetlem14.m $e |- ./\ = ( meet ` K ) $.
dihmeetlem14.a $e |- A = ( Atoms ` K ) $.
dihmeetlem14.u $e |- U = ( ( DVecH ` K ) ` W ) $.
dihmeetlem14.s $e |- .(+) = ( LSSum ` U ) $.
dihmeetlem14.i $e |- I = ( ( DIsoH ` K ) ` W ) $.
dihmeetlem20N $p |- ( ( ( K e. HL /\ W e. H ) /\ ( X e. B /\ -. X .<_ W ) /\ ( ( Y e. B /\ -. Y .<_ W ) /\ ( X ./\ Y ) .<_ W ) ) -> ( I ` ( X ./\ Y ) ) = ( ( I ` X ) i^i ( I ` Y ) ) ) $.
